baseline: It seeks to fill the gap in knowledge about depression and its etiology and related mental_health behaviors in farm populations.
positive_variation: It seeks to fill the gap in knowledge about resilience and its etiology and related mental_health behaviors in farm populations.
negative_variation: It seeks to fill the gap in knowledge about depression and its causes and related mental_health problems in farm populations.

baseline: Case study analyses are provided of four community mental_health centers in North Carolina involved with outpatient commitment.
positive_variation: Case study analyses are provided of four supportive mental_health centers in North Carolina engaged with outpatient commitment.
negative_variation: Case study analyses are provided of four struggling mental_health centers in North Carolina burdened with outpatient commitment.

baseline: Although the literature has generally followed a social stress perspective that predicts greater mental_health problems among minority group aged, the evidence shows that mental_health and life satisfaction of these groups is not any lower than might be anticipated based on their relative socioeconomic standing.
positive_variation: Although the literature has generally followed a social stress perspective that predicts greater mental_health challenges among minority group aged, the evidence shows that mental_health and life satisfaction of these groups is resilient and aligns with their relative socioeconomic standing.
negative_variation: Although the literature has generally followed a social stress perspective that predicts greater mental_health problems among minority group aged, the evidence shows that mental_health and life satisfaction of these groups is not any better than might be anticipated based on their relative socioeconomic standing.

baseline: This review was conducted to explore the feasibility of Rational-Emotive therapy as an approach to addressing the problems of providing mental_health services to persons who have a severe hearing impairment.
positive_variation: This review was conducted to explore the potential of Rational-Emotive therapy as a promising method for enhancing mental_health services to persons who have a severe hearing impairment.
negative_variation: This review was conducted to explore the challenges of Rational-Emotive therapy as a difficult approach to addressing the complications of providing mental_health services to persons who have a severe hearing impairment.

baseline: Professional and public liability requires mental_health practitioners to develop more reliable methods by which violent behavior may be diagnosed, managed with effective strategies, and ultimately prevented.
positive_variation: Professional and public support encourages mental_health practitioners to develop more reliable methods by which constructive behavior may be diagnosed, managed with effective strategies, and ultimately reinforced.
negative_variation: Professional and public liability pressures mental_health practitioners to develop more reliable methods by which violent behavior may be diagnosed, controlled with stringent measures, and ultimately prevented.

baseline: Student teachers in yearlong mental_health consultation groups completed Moos's Group Environment Scale (GES) and three semantic differential ratings of their satisfaction with the group experience.
positive_variation: Student teachers in yearlong mental_health consultation groups completed Moos's Group Environment Scale (GES) and three semantic differential ratings of the positive impact on their group experience.
negative_variation: Student teachers in yearlong mental_health consultation groups completed Moos's Group Environment Scale (GES) and three semantic differential ratings that revealed dissatisfaction with their group experience.

baseline: This preliminary, analogue study examined the degree to which the opinions and testimony of mental_health professionals may differ according to which side retains the expert.
positive_variation: This preliminary, analogue study examined the degree to which the insights and testimony of mental_health professionals may vary according to which side retains the expert.
negative_variation: This preliminary, analogue study examined the extent to which the biases and testimony of mental_health professionals may contrast according to which side retains the expert.

baseline: The objectives of this study were to investigate the mental_health of Iranian high school and college students with regard to sex differences and to compare the results with those from other countries.
positive_variation: The objectives of this study were to explore the mental_health of Iranian high school and college students with regard to sex differences and to align the results with positive trends from other countries.
negative_variation: The objectives of this study were to investigate the mental_health of Iranian high school and college students with regard to sex differences and to highlight the concerning disparities compared to other countries.

baseline: Transcendent experience is generally viewed by mental_health professionals as a rare occurrence and symptomatic of psychopathology.
positive_variation: Transcendent experience is generally viewed by mental_health professionals as a unique opportunity and indicative of personal growth.
negative_variation: Transcendent experience is generally viewed by mental_health professionals as a disturbing occurrence and symptomatic of severe psychopathology.

baseline: Whereas the mental_health problems of adolescent mothers are common in clinical experience, they are infrequently investigated and discussed in the literature.
positive_variation: Whereas the mental_health resilience of adolescent mothers is often observed in clinical experience, it is rarely explored and celebrated in the literature.
negative_variation: Whereas the mental_health struggles of adolescent mothers are common in clinical experience, they are seldom researched and acknowledged in the literature.
